main event: A civilian reported finding a flying disk at the Black River Falls Fairgrounds, which was later determined to be a hoax.
interesting points: The flying disk was described as 16 inches in diameter and 7 inches thick, made of plywood and cardboard,The object was reportedly mounted on a motor propeller,The observer was charging admission to see the object,The FBI agents who inspected it concluded it was a hoax,The object was locked in a vault until it could be examined further.
witness description: Civil Air Patrol member and two local residents
